description: Baseball is a well-known sport in North America, Japan, and Canada and has gained prominence in India. Just when the game started to take shape in the country, the deadly Coronavirus pandemic hit, forcing people to stay indoors. But don't worry, on vpl, you can get a real-life experience of playing Baseball on your mobile and win real cash and rewards, all from the comfort of your couches.

The game physics of Baseball Star on vpl is the best in the industry, and the thrill of slamming that home run and seeing your points soar is second to none. So, what are you waiting for? Get that bat of yours ready to rumble. Download the vpl app, and start playing Baseball Star!

Baseball is a well-known sport in North America, Japan, and Canada and has gained prominence in India. Just when the game started to take shape in the country, the deadly Coronavirus pandemic hit, forcing people to stay indoors.

Baseball Star is your quintessential batting game. As the pitcher sends down the ball, you wait for it to arrive in your arc and then tap anywhere on the screen to swing the bat. Here timing is the key. You attain points when your shot hits the board with runs. Hitting a board with HR (home run) written on it gives you 4 points. Similarly, 3B (bases) gives you 3 points, 2B (bases) 2 points, while 1B (base) gives you 1 point. The player needs to avoid boards with -1 and Strike.
Baseball Star is a fun way of spending time after a stressful day, and you have a chance to win real cash every day. Calling all Baseball fans out there - this game is meant just for you!

data.header: How to play the Baseball Star game on vpl?

description: A slick user interface coupled with an easy-to-control theme makes Baseball Star one of vpl's easiest and most popular games. Here, you are the driver of your team, the playing field is your arena, and it is all upon you to improve your score.
The rules regarding how to play Baseball Star on vpl are pretty straightforward.
A slick user interface coupled with an easy-to-control theme makes Baseball Star one of vpl's easiest and most popular games.

instructions: After the pitcher throws the ball, tap anywhere on the screen to swing the baseball bat. Make sure you hit the ball in the correct range and time to make it a valid shot. Hitting the ball too early or too late will make the batter miss the shot.
Missing the ball once is known as a Strike. Three Strikes is 'out,' and the game will get over.
For a right-handed batter, the earlier you swing, the more left the shot goes. The later you swing, the more to the right the ball goes. And vice-versa for a left-hand batter.
Your main aim as a batter is to tap the screen at the exact time so that your shots hit the board with runs. You also need to avoid hitting the 'Strike' and '-1' boards.
If you hit any of the boards with HR, 3B, 2B, 1B written, then the said points will be added to your score. As mentioned earlier, HR = 4 points, 3B = 3 points, 2B = 2 points, 1B = 1 point.
However, if you hit the board with '-1' on it, 1 run will get deducted from your score, and the batter will change as well.
If you hit the 'Strike' Board, 0 runs will be added to your score, and a Strike will be added to the strikes tally. 3 strikes = Out.
#Tip : The boards keep on changing, so you will have to optimize the direction of your shots accordingly.
There is a timer at the top of the screen, and you keep playing till
1). The timer runs out, 2). You collect 3 strikes.
If any of conditions 1 or 2 is met, the innings is over, and your score at this point is submitted.
The scores are tallied once the game ends, and the winner is adjudged based on the same.

data.header: Tips to Play Baseball game on vpl

description: Baseball has been around for decades and stands as a premier sport in several countries.  Professional Baseball involves two teams of 9 players, and the game is played on a diamond-shaped baseball field. In an era where staying at home is the new normal, people often look for baseball games online. Baseball Star on vpl is just as exciting as the offline version and gives you a sense of playing in a real-life environment.
The key to winning real cash while playing Baseball Star is patience and practice.

normalContent: Practice is key. While the controls might look easy enough, you must get used to the pitch and feel of the online game. For this, you should ideally play the free practice games and only then go for the battles.
Have patience. Don't be too eager to swing your bat. Let the ball come towards the strike zone and only then hit. Always keep your eye on the ball, as one slight error will cost you a strike.
Have a look at where the HR board is and if you feel it is in the extreme right or extreme left, go for the next target.
